: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel: Beast mode!

Darkangel changes to bat mode and flies off with Tyrael.

Darkangel: Possible, but I doubt it. With recent events I'd say if any other faction gets involved it would be the Maximals.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Tyrael: Then let's all head out. The last thing to do is to rely on
Deathsteel to blow those shields. Once we have his signal, we close in
for the kill.

He sent an encrypted signal that was so feeble only Deathsteel could
get it.

Tyrael: Deathsteel, we are on our way. We'll be at the limit of
scanner range of Pred base. Tell me when the shields are down.

He transformed to bird mode and flew out of the base.

Dreadplague: Hey Darkangel, you think those Rogue clowns are gonna
show up again?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel grins.
> 
> Darkangel: Let's do it...
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael: Kaiser? Darkangel? Anything to say?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > "I've been ready since I got here."  Synergy briefly debates testing 
> > her particle beam cannon before she goes - preferably with Kaiser as 
> > the target - but figures it's not worth the energy.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Tyrael: Precisely what we're about to do. Unless any of you have any
> > > more to add, I suggest we get ready to destroy some Preds.
> > > 
> > > Dreadplague was already transforming, becoming and tall and dark
> > > faceless wraith. Her voice changed too, become a lot more creepy.
> > > 
> > > Dreadplague: Let us take them down!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > Synergy::
> > > > 
> > > > "Hmph.  I'm here because I choose to be here," Synergy reminds 
> > her 
> > > > companions, calming down about as much as she ever does, which is 
> > not 
> > > > much.  "And if I don't get to kick some tailpipe soon, I may well 
> > > > choose to be elsewhere.  Capiche?"
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Dreadplague: Do not worry about that. I can cause that kind of 
> > fear 
> > > > too.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > > > > ::Kaiser::
> > > > > >        "You're quite right, I had forgotten."  He thinks to 
> > > > himself
> > > > > for a 
> > > > > > moment, calming down considerably.  "However, I think that
> > > > > particular skill 
> > > > > > would best be used after the battle, thus sowing further 
> > > > confusion and 
> > > > > > dissension.  That is, of course, only if you can control it 
> > enough
> > > > > so as to 
> > > > > > not be overwhelming.  A subtle paranoia will do quite nicely 
> > > > without
> > > > > them 
> > > > > > noticing anything is wrong."
>
